Actions.Name: Upload information
Actions.Description: Retrieve S3 upload information to upload file in Tilkee's platform. After retrieving this info, you should POST your file to 's3_endpoint, with key, acl, policy, signature & AWSAccessKeyId parameters. Amazonâ€™s response is the URL you need to create your item in Tilkee.

Actions.Name: Create an item
Actions.Description: Create a new item before adding it to a project

Actions.Name: Subscribe to a Tilkee event
Actions.Description: Trigger your Flow when this event is triggered in Tilkee

Actions.Name: Subscribe to end of connexion Tilkee event
Actions.Description: Trigger your flow after connexion on a Tilkee project

Actions.Description: Trigger your flow when a Tilkee project is signed
